text: This is a list of Italian television related events from 2001. ==Events== *20 December - Flavio Montrucchio wins the second season of Grande Fratello. ==Debuts== ===International=== *7 May - // Rainbow Fish (Rai 3) (1998–2000) *September - / Mona the Vampire (Italia 1) (1999–2003) * Underdog (Italia 1) (1964–1973) * Bob the Builder (Rai 3) (1999-2012, 2015–present) */ Rotten Ralph (Rai 1) (1998–2001) * Home and Away (Comedy Life) (1988–present) ==Television shows== ===2000s=== *Grande Fratello (2000–present) ==Ending this year== ==Births== ==Deaths== ==See also== *2001 in Italy *List of Italian films of 2001
title: 2001 in Italian television
